title: CyclingTips Tour Daily Podcast: Fireworks on the Mûr de Bretagne
content:
CyclingTips Tour Daily Podcast: Fireworks on the Mûr de Bretagne

Stage 2 of the Tour de France finished atop the Mûr de Bretagne. The final 18 km were perplexing and then heartwarming, with a post-race interview that brought a tear to the eye. 

Ronan flagged down Dan Martin and Jan Bakelants for a chat.

Finally, we run through who came away from stage 1 with injuries, at least that we know of.

author: Abby Mickey
